answer:
ImmunizeBC does not have information about online booking systems. The issue you are experiencing could be temporary and related to the time of year. Health units throughout BC are experiencing high call volumes. If you are calling a central immunization booking line, an alternative would be to contact the health unit your family is immunized at directly. Use the health unit finder. Visiting the clinic is also an alternative.
Immunization Nurse
question: Looking for a way to book online for family flu shots as your call service has a hold of over 208 callers everytime I call. Or can I go into my clinic to get quicker service?
question_variation_0: can you book online for family flu shots
question_variation_1: can i book online for family flu shots as my call service has a hold of over 208 callers every time i call?
question_variation_2: how many callers to phone your clinic
